Title: Series: The Bremner-Rhind Papyrus
Description: Papyrus of Nesmin; sheet 8 with col. 23; Hieratic text. The 'Songs of Isis and Nephthys' are cols. 1--17'; 'the Ritual of Bringing in Sokar' is cols 18-21; the 'Book of Overthrowing Apep' is cols 22-32;; the 'Names of Apep' are cols 32-33.
Curator's comments: The 'Songs of Isis and Nephthys' are cols. 1--17'; 'the Ritual of Bringing in Sokar' is cols 18-21; the 'Book of Overthrowing Apep' is cols 22-32;; the 'Names of Apep' are cols 32-33. Translations by Faulkner in JEA 22 (1936): 121-40. Translation: Mark Smith, Traversing Eternity; Texts for the Afterlife from Ptolemaic and Roman Egypt (Oxford 2009), text no. 2, 3. Lorton, "The 'Triumphal Poem' of the Creator in Papyrus Bremner-Rhind," NSSEA 7/4 (August 1977), 17-23 Subject of masters thesis: - Etudes grammaticales du papyrus Bremner- Rhind. Jacqueline Lustmann, EPHE IV. A. Cabrol, Les voies processionnelles de Thebes, OLA 97, (2001), p. 637-638 [l. 26, 21]. G. Pinch, Magic in Ancient Egypt (London 1994), fig.45 (correct image?). Tarasenko, Mykola. 2016. Studies on the vignettes from chapter 17 of the Book of the Dead. I, The image of mś.w Bdšt in ancient Egyptian mythology (Archaeopress Egyptology 16), Oxford, p. 5.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (48496) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/48496)
Faulkner 1933 / The Papyrus Bremner-Rhind (Brit. Mus. No. 10188)
Quirke 1993 / Owners of funerary papyri in the British Museum (139)
